H0.text: Birds are the most abundant of all vertebrate classes, and the most recent to evolve.

H1.text: Bony fishes are the most abundant of all vertebrate classes, and the most recent to evolve.

H2.text: Reptiles are the most abundant of all vertebrate classes and the most recent to evolve.

H3.text: Mammals are the most abundant vertebrate class and the most recent to evolve.

A4.text: the vast majority of extant fish are members of Osteichthyes, being an extremely diverse and abundant group consisting of 45 orders, over 435 families and 28,000 species
